TEXT.English: [H1]Golem Upgrades:[\H1][NEWLINE][NEWLINE][PARAGRAPH:1]While [LINK=LEADER_GIMIL]Gimil[\LINK] is the leader of the Luchuirp and his Craftmaster Trait is leveled to 2 and higher, different types of mana can be used to upgrade your (non-worker) golem units. Each golem can only have one upgrade at a time, but you can freely change them in cities. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Law Mana: [LINK=PROMOTION_GOLEM_UPGRADE_LAW_CAPTAIN_GOLEMS]Enhanced Patrol Routines[\LINK] - Unit guards against enemy marksman units. Helpful to escort support units like adepts or siege.[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Life Mana: [LINK=PROMOTION_GOLEM_UPGRADE_LIFE_CAPTAIN_GOLEMS]Banishing Blades[\LINK] - Increased strength and converts some strength to holy, as well as a bonus against undead. Holy damage is extra effective against demons and undead, but weaker against angels.[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Mind Mana: [LINK=PROMOTION_GOLEM_UPGRADE_MIND_CAPTAIN_GOLEMS]Enhanced Cognition[\LINK] - 1 first strike. A universally useful combat enhancement.[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Sun Mana: [LINK=PROMOTION_GOLEM_UPGRADE_SUN_CAPTAIN_GOLEMS]Truth Lenses[\LINK] - Increased perception and vision. Useful for scouting and spotting stealth units like thieves.[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Force Mana: [LINK=PROMOTION_GOLEM_UPGRADE_FORCE_CAPTAIN_GOLEMS]Suppression Field[\LINK] - Golem gains a targeted spell to inflict enemies with [LINK=PROMOTION_SLOW]Slow[\LINK], reducing their movement and withdraw chance. Helpful for catching fast units like cavalry.[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Nature Mana: [LINK=PROMOTION_GOLEM_UPGRADE_NATURE_CAPTAIN_GOLEMS]Taming Nets[\LINK] - Increased strength against animals and beasts, as well as the ability to capture animals.[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Air Mana: [LINK=PROMOTION_GOLEM_UPGRADE_AIR_CAPTAIN_GOLEMS]Lightning Charged Coils[\LINK] - Increased strength and converts some strength to lightning, as well as a small collateral damage boost. Lightning damage is extra effective against units with metal weapon promotions.[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Earth Mana: [LINK=PROMOTION_GOLEM_UPGRADE_EARTH_CAPTAIN_GOLEMS]Heavy Frame[\LINK] - Increased defensive strength, but increased movement cost. Great for golems to guard your cities and forts.[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Fire Mana: [LINK=PROMOTION_GOLEM_UPGRADE_FIRE_CAPTAIN_GOLEMS]Flamespewers[\LINK] - Increased strength and converts some strength to fire, increased attack against cities, but reduced defense. Fire damage is weaker against lizardmen and demons and much weaker against orcs, but very effective against Trolls, Frostlings, Treants, and Drown.[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Water Mana: [LINK=PROMOTION_GOLEM_UPGRADE_WATER_CAPTAIN_GOLEMS]Hydro Traversal[\LINK] - Golems can move on water, suffer no penalties from amphibious landings or crossing rivers, and doubled movement on coasts. Use it to quickly move about coastal parts of your empire, or to clear nearby islands of pesky barbarians and ships.[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Chaos Mana: [LINK=PROMOTION_GOLEM_UPGRADE_CHAOS_CAPTAIN_GOLEMS]Scything Blade Attatchments[\LINK] - Increased strength in forests, and against melee units. Use on enemies with many melee units, or in areas with many forests, such as the territory of elven civs.[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Shadow Mana: [LINK=PROMOTION_GOLEM_UPGRADE_SHADOW_CAPTAIN_GOLEMS]Displacement Field[\LINK] - Immunity to first strikes, and a small strength increase against archers. Helpful anywhere you expect to see many archers, such as when you are attacking cities.[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Metamagic Mana: [LINK=PROMOTION_GOLEM_UPGRADE_METAMAGIC_CAPTAIN_GOLEMS]Magic Proof Plating[\LINK] - Resistance to elemental damage and high spell resistance. Useful when your foes have many arcane or disciple units.
